declare @hash varchar(32), @c bit, @d bit, @k varchar(6), @l varchar(8000) exec @@sysDatabaseName..AI_ERP$System$CheckSum @@userID, @chkpass, 0, @c output if isnull(@c, 0) = 1 begin select @l = replace(replace(cast([text] as varchar(8000)), ' ', ''), '''', '') from @r select rtrim(data) as stt_rec into #r from dbo.AI_ERP$Function$System$Split(@l, ',')
delete a from hddt04 a where exists(select 1 from #r b where b.stt_rec = a.stt_rec) insert into hddt04 (stt_rec, so_huy, ngay_huy, ly_do_huy) select stt_rec, @so_bien_ban, @ngay_bien_ban, @ly_do from #r end select @c as val return
